description: Remove a specific property from an object, returning a new object without that property.

inputs.name: object
inputs.description: The object to remove the property from

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: The name of the property to remove

outputs.name: object
outputs.description: The new object without the specified property

outputs.name: removed_value
outputs.description: The value that was removed (null if property didn't exist)

outputs.name: was_removed
outputs.description: Whether the property was actually removed (true) or didn't exist (false)
